body:
Hi everybody,

first of all i would like to thank you all to be always so helpful and quick in your response. I always trust in you and in your help!! :)

So here i am again asking for something regarding the daylight simulation.

Is there a way to match the DF_values with the testPts in order to plot the results on the testGeometry grid in Rhino (thus one value for each testPoint)?

I mean, i am able to plot the results in a "visible way", through the Gradient and Custom Preview components, but i would like also to read in Rhino the values of the Daylight Factor on each testPoint. Is it possible?

Thanks a lot in advance

Claudia
topic: Daylight Simulations - How to plot results

replies.body: Have you tried to use Grasshopper's text tag 2D or 3D components? Use test points as location and values as text.

It´s amazing!!!! Thanks a lot. It is the right thing i was looking for! :)

Can i ask you something else? Do you know also how to create curve in GH with the same DF ("let me call them iso-DaylightFactor")?

Thanks again

Claudia

Hi Claudia, Have you seen [this example](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Create_3D_visualization_with_contour_curves_for_Ladybug_and_Honeybee&slide=1&scale=1&offset=-1.914880240413396,0.000018406668573334173) on Hydra?

I have just downloaded the gh file and it was what i was looking for!

Thanks a lot again!!! You were super helpful!

Have a nice day :)

Claudia
